messages.content: ComfyUi-Ollama-YN is an integrated project that combines the prompt word template setup from ComfyUI-Prompt-MZ and the functionality of comfyui-ollama to generate prompt words that are more consistent with the requirements of stable diffusion.
Which projects were referenced in the creation of ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
The projects referenced in the creation of ComfyUi-Ollama-YN are https://github.com/stavsap/comfyui-ollama and https://github.com/MinusZoneAI/ComfyUI-Prompt-MZ.

To install ComfyUi-Ollama-YN, you need to first install ComfyUI. Then, clone the repository into the custom_nodes folder inside your ComfyUI installation or download the zip file and unzip the contents to custom_nodes/ComfyUi-Ollama-YN. Finally, start or restart ComfyUI.
What is the default model used for the first function (图片提示词推导) in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
The default model used for the first function (图片提示词推导) in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN is the llava model.
What is the default model used for the second function (简单问答) in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
The default model used for the second function (简单问答) in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN is the llama3 model.
What is the purpose of the fifth function in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
The fifth function in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN is to generate prompt words that more closely follow the stable diffusion pattern based on the input.
What should you do if you encounter an error stating that there is no model in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
If you encounter an error stating that there is no model in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN, you should install the model as described in the installation section of the documentation.
How can you change the model used in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN?
If you have a better model, you can change the model used in ComfyUi-Ollama-YN by changing the model name in the installation section to the name of the new model.
